articles.title: Celine Dion CANCELS North American leg of tour over 'severe and persistent muscle spasms' - Daily Mail
articles.description: Celine Dion has canceled the North American dates of her Courage world tour tour from March 9 to April 22. The 53-year-old singer was forced to scrap the shows by 'severe and persistent muscle spasms.'
articles.content:

articles.title: Céline Dion cancels remainder of North American dates on Courage world tour - Global News
articles.description: The cancelled dates of the previously postponed North American leg of Céline Dion's world tour include stops in Winnipeg, Saskatoon, Edmonton and Vancouver.
